original_title: As It Was Revealed Unto Jeroen Eisinga
overview: A picturesque view of a country road gives way to an idyllic tableau of a whitewashed farmhouse, in front of which sits a buxom woman dressed in Dutch folk costume holding a chubby bare baby, whom she cheerfully chuckles. Russian sacred music. Mother and child gaze serenely smiling, straight at the camera. They ascend on high.
title: As It Was Revealed Unto Jeroen Eisinga
